1.name: Attack Boost
1.description: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.

2.name: Defense Boost
2.description: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.

3.name: Evade Window
3.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

6.name: Affinity Sliding
6.description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

7.name: Fire Attack
7.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

8.name: Water Attack
8.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

9.name: Thunder Attack
9.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

10.name: Ice Attack
10.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

11.name: Dragon Attack
11.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

12.name: Poison Attack
12.description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

13.name: Paralysis Attack
13.description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

14.name: Artillery
14.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

15.name: Special Ammo Boost
15.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

16.name: Fire Resistance
16.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

17.name: Water Resistance
17.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

18.name: Thunder Resistance
18.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

19.name: Ice Resistance
19.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

20.name: Dragon Resistance
20.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

21.name: Poison Resistance
21.description: Grants protection against the effects of poison.

25.name: Muck Resistance
25.description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

27.name: Stealth
27.description: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

28.name: Constitution
28.description: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

29.name: Marathon Runner
29.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

30.name: Stamina Thief
30.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

31.name: Hunger Resistance
31.description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

32.name: Master Gatherer
32.description: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.

34.name: Slinger Capacity
34.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo abtained in the field.

35.name: Scenthound
35.description: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.

36.name: BBQ Master
36.description: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

38.name: Slugger
38.description: Makes it easier to dizzy monsters.

39.name: Horn Maestro
39.description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

40.name: Entomologist
40.description: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.

42.name: Honey Hunter
42.description: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.

45.name: Intimidator
45.description: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you.

47.name: Fortify
47.description: Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle, up to two times.

50.name: Pro Transporter
50.description: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

51.name: Item Prolonger
51.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

52.name: Speed Sharpening
52.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

54.name: Botanist
54.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

55.name: Guard
55.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

56.name: Focus
56.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

57.name: Jump Master
57.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

58.name: Master Mounter
58.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

59.name: Cliffhanger
59.description: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while climbing to walls or ivy.

60.name: Recovery Up
60.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

61.name: Recovery Speed
61.description: Speeds recovery from temporary damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

62.name: Adrenaline
62.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
